Unstoppable

Ano: 2013

Sinopse: In Unstoppable, a brand-new documentary, Kirk takes you on a personal and inspiring journey to better understand the biggest doubt-raiser in faith: Why? Kirk goes back to the beginning-literally-as he investigates the origins of good and evil and how they impact our lives - and our eternities. Reminding us that there is great hope, Unstoppable creatively asks-and answers-the age-old question: Where is God in the midst of tragedy and suffering?..
